title: The Secret Spy Glasses
description: (   ) --- Today's Mystery Video -  Toughsty Spy Glasses (USA Link) -  Toughsty Spy Glasses (International) -   Well... These spy glasses didn't work as expected. I "recorded" multiple clips on multiple SD cards and was unable to retrieve a single functional video file. Yes, it appears that this contraption sucks!
